CustomField.description: Fill in the text here to change the value of "our organization" in the Unsubscribe Link. If you do not provide a value, the default is "our organization" in the sentence "Click here to unsubscribe from all emails from our organization."
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Text to replace "our organization" in unsubscribe link. Name of organization or department.
CustomField.label: Our Organization
